data.heading: About 👋
data.paragraph1: Hi, I'm Nick, a software developer living in Australia. I have created applications for manufacturing, health and now work in finance.
data.paragraph2: I am passionate about all areas of the stack but particularly enjoy solving problems relating to scalable frontend architecture.

data.heading: Blog 🚀
data.paragraph1: I write about technical and nontechnical things sometimes. Check them out if you care to find out what I've been working on in my spare time.
